remarks: Any group element is annihilated by any multiple of its order. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Sep-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Sep-2015.)
statement:
odcl.1 $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
odcl.2 $e |- O = ( od ` G ) $.
odid.3 $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
odid.4 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
oddvdsi $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X /\ ( O ` A ) || N ) -> ( N .x. A ) = .0. ) $.
